conclusion: To solve the problem, I will analyze the image to understand the flow path of the liquid through the baffles. I will identify the connections between the spouts and the containers, then determine which container the liquid will flow into based on the flow direction.

Observe the flow direction from spout A. The liquid flows through the first baffle and then turns towards container E.
Examine the flow from spout B. The liquid moves through the second baffle and directs towards container E.
Analyze the flow from spout C. The liquid passes through the third baffle and also directs towards container E.

premise: Based on the flow directions from all spouts, it is evident that the liquid consistently flows towards container E.
